Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Device information and control.
Category.Description: Category for Device information and control.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Image Format Control features.
Category.Description: Category for Image Format Control features.

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.
Category.Description: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the transport Layer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the transport Layer control features.

Category.Name: AnalogControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Analog control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Analog control features.

Category.Name: PixelCorrectionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the pixel correction control.
Category.Description: Category that contains the pixel correction control.

Category.Name: ChunkDataControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Chunk Data control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Chunk Data control features.

Category.Name: CoaXPress
Category.Description: Category that contains the CoaXPress features.

Category.Name: BIT
Category.ToolTip: Category for Build In Test features.
Category.Description: Category for Build In Test features.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the device to its power up state. After reset, the device must be rediscovered.
Command.Description: Resets the device to its power up state. After reset, the device must be rediscovered.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the device.
StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceModelName
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides the model of the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides the model of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceManufacturerInfo
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides extended manufacturer information about the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides extended manufacturer information about the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides the version of the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides the version of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: Version of the firmware in the device.
StringReg.Description: Version of the firmware in the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceSerialNumber
StringReg.ToolTip: Device's serial number. This string is a unique identifier of the device.
StringReg.Description: Device's serial number. This string is a unique identifier of the device.

Boolean.Name: DeviceGPIOAvailable
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates the avaliability of GPIO support in the camera.
Boolean.Description: Indicates the avaliability of GPIO support in the camera.

Boolean.Name: DeviceDDRAvailable
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates the avaliability of DDR support in the camera.
Boolean.Description: Indicates the avaliability of DDR support in the camera.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceSensorType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Device sensor model.
Enumeration.Description: Device sensor model.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTemperatureSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.

Integer.Name: Timestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the current value of the device timestamp counter in nanoseconds
Integer.Description: Reports the current value of the device timestamp counter in nanoseconds

Command.Name: TimestampReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the current value of the device timestamp counter.
Command.Description: Resets the current value of the device timestamp counter.

Command.Name: TimestampLatch
Command.ToolTip: Latches the current timestamp counter into Timestamp Latch Value.
Command.Description: Latches the current timestamp counter into Timestamp Latch Value.

Integer.Name: TimestampLatchValue
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the latched value of the timestamp counter in nanoseconds
Integer.Description: Reports the latched value of the timestamp counter in nanoseconds

Integer.Name: TimestampResetValue
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the reset value of the timestamp counter in nanoseconds
Integer.Description: Reports the reset value of the timestamp counter in nanoseconds

Enumeration.Name: DeviceSerialPortSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which serial port of the device to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which serial port of the device to control.

Integer.Name: DeviceSerialPortEventId
Integer.ToolTip: Event Id assosiated with selected serial port.
Integer.Description: Event Id assosiated with selected serial port.

Register.Name: DeviceSerialPortTxBuffer
Register.ToolTip: Serial port command send buffer data.
Register.Description: Serial port command send buffer data.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: WidthMin
Integer.ToolTip: Minimum width of the image (in pixels). The dimension is calculated after any function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.
Integer.Description: Minimum width of the image (in pixels). The dimension is calculated after any function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width of the image (in pixels). The dimension is calculated after any function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.
Integer.Description: Maximum width of the image (in pixels). The dimension is calculated after any function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.

Enumeration.Name: Region0Mode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the Region 0 of interest is active and streaming.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the Region 0 of interest is active and streaming.

Enumeration.Name: Region1Mode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the Region 1 of interest is active and streaming.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the Region 1 of interest is active and streaming.

Enumeration.Name: Region2Mode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the Region 2 of interest is active and streaming.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the Region 2 of interest is active and streaming.

Enumeration.Name: Region3Mode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the Region 3 of interest is active and streaming.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the Region 3 of interest is active and streaming.

Enumeration.Name: Region4Mode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the Region 4 of interest is active and streaming.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the Region 4 of interest is active and streaming.

Enumeration.Name: Region5Mode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the Region 5 of interest is active and streaming.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the Region 5 of interest is active and streaming.

Enumeration.Name: Region6Mode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the Region 6 of interest is active and streaming.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the Region 6 of interest is active and streaming.

Integer.Name: Region0OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Region 0 vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Region 0 vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Region1OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Region 1 vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Region 1 vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Region2OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Region 2 vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Region 2 vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Region3OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Region 3 vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Region 3 vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Region4OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Region 4 vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Region 4 vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Region5OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Region 5 vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Region 5 vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Region6OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Region 6 vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Region 6 vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: RegionHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels) in multi-roi mode.
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels) in multi-roi mode.

Enumeration.Name: TDIMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Mode of TDI operation.
Enumeration.Description: Mode of TDI operation.

Integer.Name: TDIStages
Integer.ToolTip: Number of TDI stages to be accumolated in TDI mode.
Integer.Description: Number of TDI stages to be accumolated in TDI mode.

Integer.Name: TDIFrameCountMax
Integer.ToolTip: Number of maximum frames that can be acquired in Record TDI mode.
Integer.Description: Number of maximum frames that can be acquired in Record TDI mode.

Integer.Name: TDIFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire in Record TDI mode.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire in Record TDI mode.

Integer.Name: BandXShift
Integer.ToolTip: Satellite movement horizontal shift.
Integer.Description: Satellite movement horizontal shift.

Integer.Name: BandYShift
Integer.ToolTip: Satellite movement vertical shift.
Integer.Description: Satellite movement vertical shift.

Integer.Name: BandXYShift
Integer.ToolTip: Satellite movement vertical and horizontal shift parallel modify.
Integer.Description: Satellite movement vertical and horizontal shift parallel modify.

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: HeightMin
Integer.ToolTip: Minimum height of the image (in pixels). The dimension is calculated after any function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.
Integer.Description: Minimum height of the image (in pixels). The dimension is calculated after any function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height of the image (in pixels). This dimension is calculated after any function changing the vertical dimension of the image.
Integer.Description: Maximum height of the image (in pixels). This dimension is calculated after any function changing the vertical dimension of the image.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature indicates the format of the pixel to use during the acquisition.
Enumeration.Description: This feature indicates the format of the pixel to use during the acquisition.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Scan type of the sensor of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Scan type of the sensor of the device.

Enumeration.Name: TestPattern
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.

Command.Name: AcquisitionReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the imgae acquisition logic and counters.
Command.Description: Resets the imgae acquisition logic and counters.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: This feature starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: This feature starts the Acquisition of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: This feature stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: This feature stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionStartMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Aquisition Start mode: 0-Standard, 1 - PPS synced
Enumeration.Description: Aquisition Start mode: 0-Standard, 1 - PPS synced

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).

EnumEntry.Name: Timed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Timed exposure. The exposure duration is set using the ExposureTime.

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time (in microseconds) when ExposureMode is Timed or TriggerTimed.
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time (in microseconds) when ExposureMode is Timed or TriggerTimed. This controls the duration where the photosensitive cells are exposed to light.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates an internal trigger. TriggerSource must be set to Software.
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. TriggerSource must be set to Software.

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.

EnumEntry.Name: DigitalAll
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all digital channels or taps.

EnumEntry.Name: DigitalRed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the red digital channel.

EnumEntry.Name: DigitalGreen
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the green digital channel.

EnumEntry.Name: DigitalBlue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the blue digital channel.

Float.Name: Gain
Float.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value.

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to all digital channels or taps.

EnumEntry.Name: Red
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to the red digital channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Green
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to the green digital channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Blue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to the blue digital channel.

Float.Name: BlackLevel
Float.ToolTip: Controls the digital black level as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the digital black level as an absolute physical value.

Float.Name: AnalogBlackLevel
Float.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value. Represents the applied DC offset.
Float.Description: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value. Represents the applied DC offset.

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic black level adjustment.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic black level adjustment.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Analog black level is user controlled using BlackLevel.

EnumEntry.Name: AnalogContinuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Analog black level is constantly adjusted by the device.

Boolean.Name: DefectPixelCorrectionEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Activates the Defect Pixel correction algorithm.
Boolean.Description: Activates the Defect Pixel correction algorithm.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelSelectorMax
Integer.ToolTip: Total number of defect pixels to be corrected.
Integer.Description: Total number of defect pixels to be corrected.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects which defect pixel to control.
Integer.Description: Selects which defect pixel to control.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelX
Integer.ToolTip: Configure defect pixel X coordinate.
Integer.Description: Configure defect pixel X coordinate.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelY
Integer.ToolTip: Configure defect pixel Y coordinate.
Integer.Description: Configure defect pixel Y coordinate.

Command.Name: DefectPixelRemove
Command.ToolTip: Remove the defect pixel determined by DefectPixelWriteX and DefectPixelWriteY from volatile memory.
Command.Description: Remove the defect pixel determined by DefectPixelWriteX and DefectPixelWriteY from volatile memory.

Boolean.Name: ChunkModeActive
Boolean.ToolTip: Activates the inclusion of Chunk data in the payload of the image.
Boolean.Description: Activates the inclusion of Chunk data in the payload of the image.

Integer.Name: ChunkOrbitNumber
Integer.ToolTip: Present Orbit Number.
Integer.Description: Present Orbit Number.

Integer.Name: ChunkTaskID
Integer.ToolTip: Unique Job/Task ID Generated by Ground.
Integer.Description: Unique Job/Task ID Generated by Ground.

Integer.Name: ChunkImageStartTime
Integer.ToolTip: Imaging Start time (Seconds level Accuracy).
Integer.Description: Imaging Start time (Seconds level Accuracy).

Integer.Name: ChunkImagingDuration
Integer.ToolTip: Imaging duration (Seconds level Accuracy.
Integer.Description: Imaging duration (Seconds level Accuracy.

Integer.Name: ChunkConfigTDIFile
Integer.ToolTip: Camera Configuration ID (max 16 ID). TDI Configurations (max 16 ID).
Integer.Description: Camera Configuration ID (max 16 ID). TDI Configurations (max 16 ID).

Float.Name: ChunkLatitude
Float.ToolTip: Image Frame central Latitude (single precision Floating point).
Float.Description: Image Frame central Latitude (single precision Floating point).

Float.Name: ChunkLongitude
Float.ToolTip: Image Frame central Longitude (single precision Floating point).
Float.Description: Image Frame central Longitude (single precision Floating point).

Integer.Name: ChunkPPSRef
Integer.ToolTip: Seconds level precision for the duration of mission life.
Integer.Description: Seconds level precision for the duration of mission life.

Integer.Name: ChunkTimeRef
Integer.ToolTip: 8 ns level precision for the duration of mission life.
Integer.Description: 8 ns level precision for the duration of mission life.

Integer.Name: ChunkTimeCounter
Integer.ToolTip: 8 ns precision, for the duration of a session.
Integer.Description: 8 ns precision, for the duration of a session.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkID
Integer.ToolTip: Bootstrap register DeviceLinkID.
Integer.Description: Bootstrap register DeviceLinkID.

Integer.Name: MasterHostLinkID
Integer.ToolTip: Bootstrap register MasterHostLinkID.
Integer.Description: Bootstrap register MasterHostLinkID.

Integer.Name: ControlPacketDataSize
Integer.ToolTip: Bootstrap register ControlPacketDataSize.
Integer.Description: Bootstrap register ControlPacketDataSize.

Integer.Name: StreamPacketDataSize
Integer.ToolTip: Bootstrap register StreamPacketDataSize.
Integer.Description: Bootstrap register StreamPacketDataSize.

Enumeration.Name: ConnectionConfig
Enumeration.ToolTip: Bootstrap register ConnectionConfig.
Enumeration.Description: Bootstrap register ConnectionConfig.

Enumeration.Name: ConnectionConfigDefault
Enumeration.ToolTip: Bootstrap register ConnectionConfigDefault.
Enumeration.Description: Bootstrap register ConnectionConfigDefault.

Boolean.Name: VersionsSupported_1_0
Boolean.ToolTip: Versions 1.0 of the CoaXPress specification supported by the Device.
Boolean.Description: Versions 1.0 of the CoaXPress specification supported by the Device.

Boolean.Name: VersionsSupported_1_1
Boolean.ToolTip: Versions 1.1 of the CoaXPress specification supported by the Device.
Boolean.Description: Versions 1.1 of the CoaXPress specification supported by the Device.

Boolean.Name: VersionsSupported_2_0
Boolean.ToolTip: Versions 2.0 of the CoaXPress specification supported by the Device.
Boolean.Description: Versions 2.0 of the CoaXPress specification supported by the Device.

Enumeration.Name: VersionUsed
Enumeration.ToolTip: Version of the CoaXPress specification used to communicate between the Device and Host.
Enumeration.Description: Version of the CoaXPress specification used to communicate between the Device and Host.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTapGeometry
Enumeration.ToolTip: Describes the geometrical properties characterizing the taps of a camera as presented at the output of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Describes the geometrical properties characterizing the taps of a camera as presented at the output of the device.

Integer.Name: Image1StreamID
Integer.ToolTip: This gives the Stream ID of the first image stream from the Device.
Integer.Description: This gives the Stream ID of the first image stream from the Device.

Integer.Name: SensorRegAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Sensor register address.
Integer.Description: Sensor register address.

Integer.Name: SensorRegValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the value of sensor register at SensorRegAddress address.
Integer.Description: Returns the value of sensor register at SensorRegAddress address.

Integer.Name: HardwareRegAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Hardware register address.
Integer.Description: Hardware register address.

Integer.Name: HardwareRegValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the value of Hardware register at SensorRegAddress address.
Integer.Description: Returns the value of Hardware register at SensorRegAddress address.

Integer.Name: LineDuration
Integer.ToolTip: Line processing time in units of 12.5 nano-seconds(nsecs).
Integer.Description: Line processing time in units of 12.5 nano-seconds(nsecs).

Integer.Name: LineGap
Integer.ToolTip: Line Gap
Integer.Description: Line gap time in units of 12.5 nano-seconds(nsecs).

Integer.Name: FIFOLevel
Integer.ToolTip: FIFO Level
Integer.Description: Current FIFO Level

Integer.Name: StreamLvdsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: StreamLvdsLocked.
Integer.Description: StreamLvdsLocked.

Integer.Name: StreamLvdsEnable
Integer.ToolTip: StreamLvdsEnable.
Integer.Description: StreamLvdsEnable.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionImageMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the output image mode.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the output image mode.

Integer.Name: UserTestSetResetAllAlias
Integer.ToolTip: Reset all configuration user sets.
Integer.Description: Reset all configuration user sets.

Integer.Name: BITStartAllAlias
Integer.ToolTip: Start all BIT.
Integer.Description: Start all BIT.

Integer.Name: BITCount
Integer.ToolTip: BIT count.
Integer.Description: BIT count.

Integer.Name: BITSelectorIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Selects BIT configuration.
Integer.Description: Selects BIT configuration.

Enumeration.Name: BITSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects BIT configuration.
Enumeration.Description: Selects BIT configuration.

Enumeration.Name: BITStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: BIT current status.
Enumeration.Description: BIT current status.

Port.Name: Device
Port.ToolTip: Port giving access to the device.
